game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: Rumors say the lost artifact is hidden deep in the jungle. Be careful, there are dangers lurking everywhere.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.description: You must enter the ancient temple located in the heart of the jungle and search for clues.
A fierce beast guards the artifact. Defeat it to proceed.
The artifact is within reach. Grab it and prepare to leave.
